thread.title: Global Stocks Fall on Growth Concerns
thread.title_full: Global Stocks Fall on Growth Concerns - WSJ

author: Riva Gold
title: Global Stocks Fall on Growth Concerns
text:
Global stocks fell Wednesday after weak consumer inflation data from China added to concerns about slowing growth.
The Stoxx Europe 600 was down 0.8% in early trade, deepening losses from Tuesday.
Chinese inflation slowed in September, data from Chinaâ€™s National Bureau of Statistics showed Wednesday. The consumer price index rose 1.6%...
